review.description: Excellent food and the people working there are super nice. Try the checken stew - delicious!
review.author: Dan W.

review.description: This place is alright.  It's not a fancy shmancy place (or anything close to it), but if you want an empanada to go, or some great chicken soup, this is the spot.  The chicken soup is probably the only thing worth mentioning there actually.  The broth is so good and the chicken is literally falling off the bone.  Good soup? Yes.  Good enough to get me to make the trip down there? Um, no.
review.author: Huseina S.
